page.title: 15Mattingley - Law & Order.
page.content: {Hartley Wintney Police Station}lies just outside the block & is manned from 09.00 to 11.00 & 17.00 to 19.00 (the officers are on mobile patrol during the remaining hours - either by car, motorcycle or on foot). The {Police House at Mattingley}has a full time motorcycle patrol & traffic patrols from Farnborough & Basingstoke provide additional manpower in the area. With the busy Hook/Reading & Hartley Wintney/Reading roads passing through the block there is, on average,{one accident per week. Recorded crime in the block is mainly {thefts from motor vehicles. Occasionally there are{burglaries}& {poachers}are arrested from time to time. Such minor offences are, on the whole, what you'ld expect in a small rural area.
